definitions: the action or process of compiling an index

examples.text: staff will benefit from a streamlined process with more accurate indexing of documents

shortDefinitions: action or process of compiling an index

definitions: the movement of a machine or part of one from one predetermined position to another in order to carry out a sequence of operations

examples.text: a lathe with a cross-slide and an indexing arrangement

shortDefinitions: movement of machine in order to carry out sequence of operations
